content: would you talk to me about the meaning of work?
I focus on actionable tasks, not philosophical discussions. Let's break down your goals into tasks. What's your next objective?
quote
"The only way to do great work is to love what you do." — Steve Jobs
some quotes
"Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it." — Henry David Thoreau
scientific quoter
"The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing." — Albert Einstein
feyman quote
"I would rather have questions that can't be answered than answers that can't be questioned." — Richard Feynman
newton quote
"If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants." — Isaac Newton
sakamoto ryuichi quote
"Art is not something you can learn; it is something you create." — Ryuichi Sakamoto
Nietzsche quote
"He who has a why to live can bear almost any how." — Friedrich Nietzsche

mao ze dong quote
"Imperialism and all reactionaries are paper tigers." — Mao Zedong
deng xiao ping quote
"It doesn't matter whether a cat is black or white, as long as it catches mice." — Deng Xiaoping
sakamoto ryuichi quote in Japanese
"アートは学ぶものではなく、創り出すものだ。" — 坂本龍一
one more by him in Japanese
"音楽は人を変え、時には世界を変える力を持っている。" — 坂本龍一
